snippet.title: The Kite Trailer 2018
snippet.description:
The Kite is a first project of Anate Studio. It is a small dramatic point-and-click adventure which highlights the problems of an unsuccessful family.
It was released on 1 january 2012. And remastered in 2018. 

  The main character of the game is Mary, a resident of a regular town in 90th. She is a loving mother and careful wife, but her husband, full of different problems, falls down to the alcoholism and domestic abuse. Mary agrees to tolerate, but not when it is about life and health of her child, she is ready to do anything...

The game avaliable for free on Steam and itch.io

Music by Abstracode
Anate Studio web page: www.anatestudio.net
